Public Remarks: Beautiful south facing brick ranch, nestled in a quiet neighborhood, but close to so much! No HOA! The porch overlooks a low-maintenance landscaped front yard. The main level includes three bedrooms and one full updated bathroom. Access the lower finished level through the kitchen, which also leads to the spacious back yard, creating an ideal layout to convert the basement into a short or long term rental opportunity. Think multi-generational living options, or house hack income potential! Two non-conforming bedrooms (no egress), a 3/4 bathroom, and a family or recreation room comprise the lower level, as well as an unfinished utility and laundry room with generous storage and radon mitigation system. The fully fenced private, back yard is perfect for entertaining, gardening, hanging out, etc. Bring your s'more ingredients to roast at the fire pit. Plus, there's a storage shed for your crafts/tools/toys. Oversized driveway with plenty of off-street parking, even for an RV or boat. Close proximity to dining, grocery stores, shopping, rec center, and schools. Convenient access to I-25, and the new RTD light rail station that brings you downtown.

Public Remarks: If you are looking for a move-in ready home in the heart of Thornton, close to everything you could possibly need, then look no further. Located in the sought after Colony Park Subdivision, this traditional home features a two car attached garage that will keep your vehicles safe from the elements, as well as new gutters.  As you step inside you'll be greeted by elegant wood flooring and high vaulted ceilings. The semi-open floor plan provides a feeling of spaciousness and connects the living room to the unfinished basement and convenient 1/2 bath.  A beautiful dining area can be found nearby with access to the backyard.  Plenty of natural light can be found here as you share a meal or a quick snack with friends and loved ones.  The adjacent eat-in-kitchen features laminate counters and gorgeous cabinets.  All appliances are included, and the breakfast bar is a big plus for entertaining or cooking.  As you head upstairs you will appreciate the view of the living room and vaulted ceilings, and with three bedrooms to be found nearby, you will have no shortage of room for your loved ones. The beautiful wood floors continue to the master bedroom which includes a vaulted ceiling and a ceiling fan.  A full bath can be found nearby for the convenience of all.  As you enter the backyard you will appreciate the huge lot and all the potential it provides. Your furry friends will love the running space and its easy to imagine hosting your friends and neighbors for a large summer bbq. The patio is a perfect place to make your own.  If you love to garden you will have enough space to create the garden of your dreams. Several open space parks can be found nearby with quick access. I-25 is close enough, but not too close. With Shopping, Entertainment, Restaurants, Grocery, Trails, and so much more in your grasp, why look anywhere else?  The only thing missing from this home is you!

Public Remarks: Don't miss this meticulously maintained and recently upgraded 2-Story home in the Woodhaven neighborhood of Thornton. The all new exterior paint is sure to catch your eye as you approach the home.  As you enter, the double-height ceilings are sure to make a grand first impression. The living room features carpeted floors and a board & batten decorative wall. The dining room, adjacent to the living room, boasts a tray ceiling and carpeted floors. The eat-in kitchen has been full upgraded and is highlighted by white quartz counter tops, subway tile backsplash, breakfast bar, hardwood floors, stainless steel appliances and island that accommodates four chairs. The kitchen is open to the family room, with an exterior access door to the backyard between the rooms for easy and convenient outdoor dining. A laundry room/mud room and 1/2 bath complete the main level. The upper level holds 3 of the 4 bedrooms, including the Master Suite with vaulted ceilings, ensuite 4-piece bathroom, and walk -in closet with French door entry.  All upper level bedrooms with carpeted floors and ceiling fans. A full bathroom with wood-look laminate floor completes the upper level. The full finished basement holds the 4th bedroom (conforming), 3/4 bathroom, and two large, adjoining bonus rooms. Carpeted floors throughout the basement, except the wood-look laminate floors in 3/4 bathroom.  The backyard is in immaculate condition, with an expansive slab stone patio, firepit with pergola, landscaping, lush grass, sidewalk on both sides on homes and pear and plumb tree.  Seller recent upgrades include all new interior paint, exterior paint, flooring, bathroom vanities, furnace & water heater (2019), roof (before closing), all sink valves, smoke detectors, most of the lighting throughout, quartz counters and kitchen backsplash. What are you waiting for? Welcome HOME!!

Public Remarks: Welcome to the meticulously maintained and charming Fox Run 2 -story home located on the corner-lot featuring 3 beds, 2.5 baths, living room, kitchen, dining room, loft, and 2 car garage. The house is in perfect condition and move-in ready. Beautiful upgrades including slab granite counters, stainless steel appliances, numerous ceiling fans, and more. Enjoy relaxing and watching the beautiful dawn and dusk on the covered patio and stay cool with the 3 ceiling fans or garden in the beds. The utility shed is great for storage or toys. Pride of ownership throughout. The energy-efficient furnace, central air conditioning, ceiling fans, and gas fireplace keep this home comfortable all year long. The many windows throughout the home allow the natural sunlight to cascade in – bright and cheerful. Neutral tones make it easy to picture yourself calling this one home. Such a rare find in Northglenn. Close to dining, shopping, entertainment, freeways and other amenities. Walking distance to a park. Don’t miss your opportunity. Public Remarks: Welcome to this Charming home in Fox Run that has been wonderfully cared for with numerous updates over the years. In addition to the two current conforming bedrooms, this home has plenty of room for you to add your personal mark and designer touches, with numerous options to add additional bedrooms in the open upper-level loft or the currently unfinished basement. Vaulted ceilings and two-story windows fill the home with an abundance of natural light. The cozy family room features a gas fireplace and provides ample room for entertainment. The kitchen nook and main level open to an expansive oversized deck to carry the entertainment and Sunday brunch to the outdoors. Updated special features include newly finished floors, updated light fixtures and ceiling fans, new sink and faucet in the kitchen, new hardware, light dimmers, some recently updated windows, newly stained wood floors, sprinkler system, motion sensor security lights, and fresh new interior paint throughout. Enjoy one of the few Northglenn homes set in a peaceful location that has proximity to paths, lakes, tennis courts, skate park, recreation center, restaurants, shopping, major transit, and numerous parks where amenities can be enjoyed throughout the year including the Fourth of July fireworks display at Mary Carpenter Park. This attractive home is loaded with potential and an instant opportunity to build equity!

Public Remarks: Updated move in ready brick home with 2100+ finished square feet with lots of upgrades + a 2 car direct access garage and RV/boat parking located on a tree lined street in a quiet well-kept neighborhood near schools, parks, shopping, dining and with easy access to I25. Enjoy 3 main level living areas including a spacious formal living room with crown molding, big picture window, and gleaming refinished hardwood flooring, plus a separate light and bright family room with a wall of windows and brand-new wood grain luxury vinyl flooring, and a sunny bonus/playroom with ceramic tile flooring. The huge, updated kitchen has a center island, granite countertops, brand new luxury wood grain vinyl flooring, and upgraded fixtures. The upstairs bathroom has been totally remodeled plus there is a brand new custom ¾ bath in the lower level. Other features include refinished hardwood flooring in the hallway and bedrooms (no carpet), brand new paint throughout, white 6 panel doors, thousands of dollars’ worth of large sunny double pane vinyl windows, and ceiling fans in every bedroom. The lower level is highlighted by a second family room and a great workshop with shelves, cabinets, and workbench. Outside you will find a large yard with mature shade trees, a patio perfect for summer barbecues and 2 utility sheds. All appliances are included, and this home has been “Home Warranty Pre-Inspected” and comes with a FREE 14 Month Home Buyer’s Warranty + the roof has been Pre-Inspected and a 5 year Certification has been issued. ***Check out the ATTACHED CUSTOM WEBSITE featuring a 24 hour “3-D Virtual Open House” Video and more Pictures***

The detached two car garage has been insulated and includes heating, air conditioning, built-in shelving, and storage galore!

This well maintained home sits on a corner lot minutes away from Thornton Crossroads and 104th RTD station for quick and easy access to Denver.  Enjoy working from home in your home office that features vaulted ceilings and a ton of natural light.  The kitchen is open to the dining and living area and offers plenty of cabinet space and large pantry.  The living room on the main floor feels spacious with the high ceilings and offers built in shelves and a gas fire place.  The master bedroom also offers vaulted ceilings leaving it feeling open and spacious as well.  The basement is finished with a beautiful stone accent wall as well as an additional gas fireplace to keep you warm downstairs.  The basement also features a bonus room (non conforming) as well as a 3/4 bathroom.  HOA maintains the grounds in front of the house and the backyard is zeroscaped to offer the new owners very minimal upkeep outside.  This home wont last long!

Public Remarks: 4 car garage!! Yes, you read that right! Let's not get ahead of ourselves though, allow me to introduce you to your new home! This beautifully maintained multi-level home with over 2,300SF boasts a light and bright atmosphere with original hardwood floors and two spacious living rooms. The main living room features a large window that offers great natural light. The eat-in kitchen offers granite countertops and flows directly into the dining room. Head upstairs from the main floor to find the spacious primary bedroom (with a 3/4 en suite bathroom) two additional bedrooms and a full bathroom. Go downstairs to the lower level for an additional living space complete with a wood burning fireplace, new carpet, and a bathroom. From there you can head to the basement which is ready for your finishing touches offering a framed 4th bedroom plus large potential rec room, laundry room and tons of storage. The large backyard is beautifully landscaped and perfect for entertaining. Offering mature trees, sprinkler system, brand new privacy fence, partially enclosed covered patio, floating deck and of course the oversized detached 4 car garage. The possibilities are endless with this HUGE garage! Originally used for woodworking/carpentry there are ample power outlets throughout and endless storage shelving. This garage would be perfect for storing all your toys & cars, fulfilling your craft/hobby/wood-working/dreams, becoming an epic home gym or whatever your heart desires. Located in a quiet neighborhood close to the new light rail, schools and offering easy access to shopping, I-25 and parks this home will not last long. Schedule your tour today!

Public Remarks: Excellent location on a street with a cul-de-sac, this is a rare brick ranch home near to everything you want and want to do!      The main floor primary bedroom was expanded and has an an en-suite bath.  The second bedroom on the main floor is conveniently located across the hall from the main floor full bathroom.  There is plenty of cabinet space in the kitchen and all appliances are included!  A sliding glass door leads from the kitchen to the large, covered back patio with recessed LED lighting and stamped and colored concrete floor. The huge back yard, which is completely fenced, provides space for many hours of entertainment and is a great place for kids and pets to play. In the basement, there are two non-conforming bedrooms with closets.  Both have convenient access to a bath with shower.  A huge family room in the basement is perfect for another living space for your family. Public Remarks: Tucked away on a wide cul-de-sac, and backing to Stonehocker Park, this spacious Fox Run abode is the perfect place to call home! Relish the incredible open space views from the back deck of the park's babbling brook and rolling hills and the unobstructed mountain vistas that stretch across the evening sunset. The interior is just as impressive with plantation shutters, abundant natural light, a sweeping open floorplan & wonderful open space and mountain views from every west-facing window. The dining room greets you off the entry and flows into the sizable family room that is anchored by a cozy gas fireplace. Updated kitchen delights with ample crisp white cabinetry, an island with seating, a pantry, tile backsplash, recessed lighting & stainless steel appliances. Main floor is completed by a powder room and a laundry room that doubles as a mudroom with access to the attached 3-car garage. Upper level hosts the primary suite, 2 secondary bedrooms, a full bathroom & a flexible loft space with a walk-in closet that makes a great office or playroom. Primary suite boasts a sprawling bedroom, more lovely views, a large walk-in closet, a sleek electric fireplace & a luxurious 5 piece bathroom complete with a custom barn door. The finished light-filled basement provides excellent additional living space with a conforming bedroom (that also makes a great home gym!), a half bathroom, a substantial storage space & an expansive rec room that walks out to the covered flagstone patio. The yard is over 1/4 of an acre, is professionally landscaped & offers great outdoor living space with a charming front porch, mature trees & a fenced backyard. Perfectly situated, the cul-de-sac this gem sits on is enveloped by Stonehocker Park, lending itself to a private and secluded feeling. An extensive network of paved trails runs right outside the back door and leads directly to the fabulous recreational facilities of Carpenter Park as well as several other area parks.

Public Remarks: An oasis in the city!  Only one block to parks, rec center and walking paths.  Outdoor pleasures abound in this ranch style home on an 11,700 sq. ft. landscaped and fenced lot with water pond, arched grapevine arbors and raised garden beds.  The main level of the 1970's ranch style, brick and siding home has a large living room, 2 bedrooms, large walk-in closet, one full bath and a cozy kitchen with custom built wood table and corner bench, with views to the back yard. The finished basement has a comfortable family room with furnace-rated electric fireplace, a generously sized, conforming bedroom with walk in closet, en-suite bath with heated/jetted spa tub, a craft/office nook, laundry closet and a non-conforming additional basement bedroom. Plus..... A radon mitigation system is already installed!  Xeriscape plants and trees with drip water system adorn the front landscaped area of the home while the back features a large covered patio, cedar play fort, play areas, fruit trees and nearly 1/4 acre of landscaped back yard. The entire landscape has a valve controlled sprinkler / drip / mist system.  An underground electrical power line is installed to the back garden/oasis area to provide for the water feature pump and twinkling lights. The metal shed in the back side yard is included.  There is a bricked side "driveway" on the front/south side of the home which leads to behind the fence in the back yard.  Situated just one block from the wonderful, Thornton Carpenter Park complex and Recreation Area, you, your family and friends will be able to enjoy numerous, year round recreation opportunities.   This house and exceptional property will not last long.  All information deemed reliable but Buyer and Buyer's Realtor to independently verify sq. ft. and all pertinent information.

Public Remarks: Classic design and a spacious floor plan await with this lovely tri-level home in a great Thornton neighborhood with an oversized yard! A pretty tree-lined street provides a warm welcome to a function layout waiting inside. A recently remodeled is perfect for entertaining and boasts plenty of warm wood cabinetry for all your storage needs and a large eat-in island that makes meal prep easy. Enjoy the sunroom off the kitchen to extend your living space and soak up that Colorado sunshine! Journey upstairs to find the primary and guest bedrooms. The guest bedroom has a charming barn door to the closet while the primary has a nice walk-in closet. Lower-level 3rd bedroom is sunny and bright from garden-level windows and offers plenty of storage, an egress window, and a nearby recently added bath with laundry access. More living space can be found in the finished basement bonus room that would make a great playroom, gym, or home office. New solid wood doors updated throughout in 2021, newer windows, and newly bull-nosed walls and texture! This gorgeous backyard offers something for everyone! Enjoy entertaining on the expansive deck, relax by the fire pit with pretty string lights, watch the kiddos play in the sandbox under the tree or fenced-in swing-set, or garden to your heart’s content in the many garden beds! You can even enjoy fireworks right from the privacy of your backyard! Wonderful location just a short jaunt to Carpenter Park and Rec Center that offers plenty for the outdoor enthusiast, including a pond with paddle boats, a carousel, splash park! Quick access to light rail ½ mile away, and plenty of shops and restaurants all within minutes! Buyer/Buyer's agent is responsible for verifying all information, measurements and schools

Public Remarks: Spacious and affordable, with upgrades and updates throughout! This Northglenn home checks all your boxes. Enough room indoors and out let you make the most of Colorado's lifestyle and climate. From a brand new front door, the entryway is spacious and open, making you think you're not in a bi-level. Upstairs the open living room gives way to a warm and inviting kitchen and dining area offering granite counters, stainless appliances and a pantry for days! Many homes have removed the pantry for a more open feel, but we'll let you decide. Kitchen gas line added in 2021, along with entirely new gas meter and intake. The remodeled and updated patio extends off the upper level kitchen to make grilling, outdoor dining and morning coffee comfortable. Several bedrooms both upstairs and downstairs offer more than enough square footage. The additional space on the lower level can be used as a warm family room through French doors. Large laundry area now has tankless water heater! Laundry conveniently leads to the one-car attached garage that was insulated (but not drywalled) in 2021. In the backyard, welcome to custom landscaping; a massive propane-fueled stucco fireplace; piping for natural gas; sandbox; dual patios and INCLUDED patio furniture on upper and lower levels! New water intake and front / back hose valves added in 2021. Backyard shed included that is presently insulated and used to be wired for electrical. This place is ready for all your grilling and chilling needs! Plus, the home is conveniently located near highways (just east of 25), public transit, shopping, parks, schools and walking trails. Also note, extensive amount of plumbing replaced in 2021, along with approximately 80% of light fixtures. Upgrades for days!

Public Remarks: Beautiful ranch-style home in the Woodglen neighborhood! Upon entering this lovely home, you first notice the gorgeous flooring that leads to the updated kitchen, where you'll find stainless steel appliances, newer cabinets, and granite counters! The three bedrooms on the main level give everyone their own space, and the primary bedroom has a remodeled walk-in closet! The finished basement includes a bonus room along with 2 additional rooms, potentially used as an office, gym, or non-conforming bedrooms. Updates to the house also includes solar panels, Nest thermostat, a new AC unit, and double pane windows, making this home incredibly energy efficient! The spacious backyard will be your favorite place to relax and spend time with friends and family, with its large deck and plenty of grass to play in! Centrally located in Thornton, you will be within walking distance of Woodglen/Brookshire park where you can play on the playground or on one of the many sports fields! You are also minutes away from Thornton Carpenter Recreation Center and Park, as well as restaurants and shopping! A 5-minute drive takes you to the light-rail station to take you to Denver, or you also have easy access to I-25 and Highway 85!

The kitchen features quartz counter tops, updated cabinetry and all stainless-steel appliances including refrigerator, dishwasher, and range. Around the corner are two large bedrooms and a renovated full bath. The basement offers a spacious great room, which would be perfect for a media or game room! Downstairs also offers a third bedroom (non-conforming) and laundry room with storage. Step outside with friends and family onto the back covered patio and enjoy the large, fenced yard. Curl up around the outdoor built-in fire pit on those chilly Colorado evenings! If you need extra storage, the 8' x 12' shed is included! You are minutes' walk to numerous retail shops, restaurants, and groceries. Easy access to I-25 and the light rail station leading to Downtown Denver. The eat-in kitchen flows directly into the large, fully enclosed back deck (complete with enclosed storage underneath). Completing the upper-level are two spacious bedrooms and a full bathroom. Downstairs you’ll find an additional two bedrooms, and 2nd living space (could be an additional bedroom if needed) and newly renovated bathroom. The lower level is also home to the oversized laundry room and grants access to the 1 car attached garage. The large backyard is private, beautifully landscaped and perfect for entertaining. Offering mature trees, sprinkler system, brand new privacy fence, garden boxes, and separate fenced in “hang-out” space with a large tree swing.  The possibilities are endless! Located in a quiet neighborhood close to the new light rail, schools and offering easy access to shopping, I-25 and parks this home will not last long. Schedule your tour today!

Public Remarks: Opportunity knocks! Spacious two story walk-out in sought after Fox Run backing to Central Park with mountain view! Bring your imagination and ideas to update this 4 bedroom + loft home in prime location. The vaulted living room is bathed in sunlight and adjoins an airy dining room. The kitchen is just steps away and features hardwood flooring, a pantry and breakfast nook opening onto the deck. The spacious family room offers a gas fireplace & recessed lighting. The powder room is tucked away behind the family room. The upper level features a spacious loft overlooking Central Park. It's the perfect spot for a home office! The primary bedroom has a walk-in closet, full bath with double vanity and walk-in closet. The two secondary bedrooms are nicely sized and share a full bath located in the hall. The finished walk-out basement is an added bonus. It has a laundry room (washer & dryer included), bedroom (non-conforming/no closet but has egress window) and three-quarter bath. The large deck is perfect for enjoying the beautiful Colorado weather. The setting overlooking Central Park with a mountain view is awesome! Imagine a summer evening entertaining family and friends! The two car garage has an automatic opener and workbench. Other features include:  newer furnace (2018), new water heater (2018), new roof 2015. The seller's are offering $5,000 towards Buyers' closing costs.
Showing Instructions: Showings begin May 19th at 8:00am. No overlapping showings, 15-30 minute showing window please.

Public Remarks: Welcome to your new home.  As you enter the home, you'll be welcomed into the living room complete with wood floor and fireplace with insert for those cold days.  The dining room is adjacent to the kitchen which is large enough for one or many to be prepping food. The upper level has a primary bedroom w/updated onsuite. The other 2 bedrooms share a remodeled bath with new paint, tile, tub/shower fixtures, vanity, and sink. Do you need a home office, playroom, game room? Go down a level to the lower multipurpose living room complete with new laminate wood floor, paint/moulding. The laundry & powder room are on this level and there is a dog door to the fenced back yard. A big bonus is the recently finished basement w/LVM flooring plus new paint/moulding. If you need extra off-street parking for cars, trailers or RV, this is your house.  Large, fenced yard with low water grass for outdoor activities.  Also, the home is equipped with Solar PV Panels. See what Northglenn has to offer: https://www.northglenn.org   New recreation center, dog park, trails, parks, arts, low cost trash & recycle. Public Remarks: Welcome to this beautiful, spacious home boasting 4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, and over 3,200 square feet of quality living space - all nestled at the end of a cul-de-sac, perfect for both your privacy and entertainment. Natural light pours in throughout the main level thanks to the stunning vaulted ceilings and sweeping custom windows. The inviting open floor plan greets you at the front door with the spacious sitting room feeding directly into the formal dining room, perfect for hosting friends and family. Beautiful laminate wood plank floors weave through the foyer, kitchen, and dining room, while freshly cleaned carpets distinguish the two living spaces intended for relaxation. The home features a size-able kitchen with quality granite counters and backsplash, bonus pantry, eat-in bar, and additional space ideal for a floating island or a breakfast nook. You'll also find a great guest bedroom and full-size bathroom on the main floor. The second level then has an extensive master bedroom with vaulted ceilings, a luxurious 5-piece master bathroom, and large walk-in closet alongside the third bedroom and full-size bathroom. The loft provides incredible flexibility to enjoy the sunlight and be used as a home office, music room, yoga studio, you name it! At over 1,100 square feet, the finished basement includes a fourth bedroom and newly renovated bathroom, a gorgeous wet bar, gas fireplace, and enormous room perfect for a gym, home theatre, or game room! The basement could also make for a terrific mother-in-law suite. With a backyard deck ideal for grilling and enjoying all of Colorado's beautiful weather, and an oversized 2-car garage, solar panels, and walking distance to the incredible Margaret Carpenter park, this home has it all!

Public Remarks: Take a look at this amazing, peaceful sanctuary. This home has been lovingly cared for through the years and is ready for the next generation to enjoy all it has to offer. When you walk in the front door of this meticulously maintained home, you are greeted by a large family room that leads back to three bedrooms and a full bathroom, as well as an eat-in kitchen with new appliances. The lower level offers a large living/entertaining/fitness space with a built-in bar, a laundry/utility room and a 3/4 bath, as well as two more non-conforming bedrooms. The lower level has epoxy floor coating throughout, while the upper level is almost entirely oak hardwoods. A prize feature of this home is what awaits outside - the beautiful park-like yard with an amazing patio and ample space for entertaining.  The back yard is irrigated, and the front and side yards are xeriscaped. Like to grow your own veggies?  There is plenty of space to create your own garden area on the property, and old growth grapes along the Northern side of the home are ready to enjoy.  Copper piping throughout, newer furnace, water heater, and roof. The possibilities are endless! Property also has an attached one car garage as well as a large metal storage shed in the back, and ample off street parking. If you are an investor, this home is rental ready.  Run the numbers and see that this home would make a great addition to your portfolio. Home is conveniently located with easy access to I-25 and public transit.

Public Remarks: This home is ideally located in a cul de sac and is being sold AS-IS.  At Closing, with a full-price offer, Seller will credit to Buyer a $5,000 Seller Concession toward Closing Costs.  Enjoy the morning sunrises from the front porch with a beautiful shade tree.  Step inside onto the tiled foyer and then into the spacious living room with an evaporative cooler.  Flow into the dining room with a ceiling fan and large window that lets in great natural lighting.  The tiled kitchen has plenty of 42" raised-panel cabinets and lots of countertop space.  The eat-in kitchen area is perfect for casual dining.  Upstairs, the primary bedroom has an ensuite 3/4 bathoom.  There are two additional bedrooms and a full-sized bathroom.  The hallway has an attic fan that helps to keep the home nice and cool.  The roomy lower-level family room has a cozy wood-burning fireplace and sliding glass door that leads outside to the covered concrete/flagstone patio.  Also, on the lower level is the laundry area with cabinets, a bathroom and access into the 2-car garage with tons of cabinets, a 7x5 work area and the garage door is insulated.  Downstairs is the finished basement with a large 3/4 bathroom, additional storage, and two non-conforming bedrooms.  The two-tiered backyard has a view of Pikes Peak, trees, beautiful flowering shrubs and a fire pit.  There is also a utility shed for additional storage.  Because the evaporative cooler keeps the home so cool, the central air condition does not work and will not be repaired.  Amenities include:  Restaurants, Shopping, Woodglen/Brookshire Park, Playway Park, Steele Park, Harley Brown Amphitheater, Margaret W. Carpenter Recreation Center, and so much more!

Both baths are completely updated and have quartz counters. Other updates include a stamped concrete patio, landscaping, new wood floors, windows, blinds, drywall, complete electric upgrade, roof, siding, gutters, AC, furnace, R13 insulation, and ductwork. The living room and upstairs bedrooms have USB plugs, and with safety features like an egress window in the basement bedroom as well as the 2 main level bedrooms and a thick glass front security door, no detail has been spared. Just steps from the community park and walking distance to elementary & middle schools, bus, light rail, restaurants, and retail- make it yours today!

Public Remarks: Make your URBAN FARMING dreams come true! This 4 bed/2 bath home gives you the option to open the door to sustainable living while only being a short 20-minute drive to DOWNTOWN DENVER. Discover a .25-acre lot equipped with a garden that is actively growing corn, coops to house chickens/quails, a dog run, and two storage sheds. This .25-acre lot is full of opportunity. Inside awaits the perfect blank canvas to make your own and is ready for move-in. The inside is bright and roomy, and an added bonus, if you are not fans of carpet most of the main floor has HARDWOOD floors underneath. The living room flows into the kitchen which features plenty of cabinet space and matching appliances –plus the kitchen has room for a breakfast nook! Down the hall, three bedrooms and 1 full bath complete the main level. On the lower level, discover a spacious family room with a pellet fireplace and an additional large bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. The bathroom in the basement is currently a functional but only partly finished half bath, BUT what an opportunity for you to create the bathroom of your dreams! Already set up to be a 3/4 bath and walk-in closet, make this room your stunning master suite (and gain some sweat equity!). You will absolutely love the laundry room as it is HUGE! (Even big enough to be another bedroom, office, craft room, or art studio). Get creative and rent the basement bedroom to a friend to offset your mortgage! Back outside be delighted by the plentiful off-street parking including a 1-car attached carport and even room for an RV parking. All this is set in a stunning and well-maintained neighborhood with mature trees. Even more lovely in person!

Public Remarks: So much to offer with this 1960's ranch! Classic layout with living and kitchen off of the front door and 3 bedrooms down the hall. The kitchen has been updated with mostly newer (last 2 years) appliances and the previous owner added updated cabinets including a pantry cabinet in the dining nook. The primary bedroom has private access to the full bath. Downstairs you'll find plenty of room to expand with a nearly 100% finished basement. There is a non-conforming bedroom and 3/4 bath as well as plenty of storage in the laundry/mechanical room - speaking of which the furnace and AC were just replaced in 2021 and the smart thermostat stays. Roof is newer (4 years old with 1 year warranty left on it). Exterior paint was just done. Beautiful mature landscaping around the home and sprinklers. The garage is a mechanic's dream with an additional space to park a small 3rd car, ATV's, Motorcycles or use the length to pull in a large truck. Plus there is still the workshop which offers fabulous space for mechanics or hobbyists. Along the side of the home is room to park a few more cars if needed! In the back yard is a fun in-ground trampoline and large storage shed. Fridge in basement stays. Duct's were just cleaned out. This house is ready for you!
